library(huxtable)

library(readr)
library(shellpipes)

mk_url <- function(x) {
  ifelse(nchar(trimws(x))==0,x,
         sprintf("[%s](https://mac-theobio.github.io/DataViz/%s.html)",
                 x,x))
}

(
	tsvRead()
	%>% mutate_all(~sub("#.*","", .))
	%>% hux()
	%>% print_html(max_width=1000)
)
